welcome.title: Welcome to Hov Hyttegrend
welcome.description: A true nature experience in the heart of Norway

section_1.title: Hov Hyttegrend - a small piece of authentic Norway
section_1.text:
Welcome to a place where nature feels closer, the silence is deeper, and everyday life is farther away than ever.
At Hov Hyttegrend, you stay in the heart of a peaceful and beautiful natural landscape, surrounded by forests, mountains, rivers, and lakes.
Here you can experience the very best of Norwegian nature and outdoor life – perfect for adventure seekers, families, couples, and groups of friends looking for a genuine and tranquil getaway.

section_2.title: About Us
section_2.text:
Hov Hyttegrend is a small and peaceful cabin community in the heart of beautiful Fjord Norway — surrounded by mountains, waterfalls, fjords, and glaciers.
Here you have the perfect starting point to experience some of the finest nature Vestland has to offer.
We are located right next to the protected Gaular Watercourse, renowned for its many waterfalls, rapids, and tranquil mountain lakes. The river winds its way through the landscape, offering both breathtaking nature experiences and excellent fishing opportunities.

section_3.title: Active Outdoor Life
section_3.text: The area surrounding the cabins is ideal for those who want to stay active and enjoy the outdoors.

section_4.title: Sightseeing – Food – Shopping
section_4.text: Experience and shopping in the local area

section_5.title: Why Choose Us?
section_5.text:
Short local walks and grand natural scenery in one single stay.
A family-friendly and welcoming atmosphere.
Perfect for couples, families, and nature lovers.
Peace, tranquility, and authentic West Coast nature without the crowds.

section_6.title: Accommodation in a Natural Idyll
section_6.text: At Hov Hyttegrend we offer simple yet comfortable accommodation in cabins, as well as pitches for motorhomes and caravans. Here, you stay close to nature, with birdsong and the gentle sound of the river as your background music.
section_6.listItem2: Beautiful surroundings and generous space between units
section_6.listItem3: Walking distance to hiking trails and fishing lakes
